name: Patrick Elshen
bio: Patrick looks after microBUILD in London.

name: Andy Geers
bio: Andy to cofounder of Kingdom Code, creator PrayerMate, and CEO of DiscipleshipTech.

name: James Doc
bio: James lives in London, writes code, designs things, and drinks tea.

name: Dan Rackham
bio: Dan is a regular BUILD attendee and founder of Go Chatter Videos.

name: Daniel Whitenack
bio: Daniel is a data scientist at SIL International, and co-host of the Practical AI podcast.

name: Ed Bennigsen
bio: Ed is a member of the Kingdom Code community and a developer at Discipleship Tech.

name: Dave Knotts
bio: Dave is a Web Developer and lives and serves as a missionary in Central Asia.

name: Joe Gallant
bio: Joe runs Be Gallant, offering web design for churches and charities, as well as ChurchTrain, a blog with free church communications resources.

name: Matt Hardy
bio: Matt is a Linux Systems Administrator in the Christians Against Poverty technology team.

name: Jana Owens
bio: Jana is a UX designer, and part of the leadership of Kingdom Code.

name: Francis Martin
bio: Francis Martin is a journalist for the Church Times

name: Daniel Ghinn
bio: Daniel is the co-founder of Worship.Works and the CEO at Creation.co
